Developing protected Serverless Web Appl: Serverless platforms are often used to build APIs for web and mobile apps.
I’ve open sourced a pattern that shows how to implement protected APIs with IBM Cloud Functions and how to invoke them from Angular web applications.
IBM Cloud Functions comes with an API Gateway.
